verses.text: ‘EIKI, ke ke ongo‘i ‘a e totonu, fofonga ki he‘eku tautapa; He tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘alu atu mei he ngutu kākā.
Ke ‘alu atu mei ho fofonga hoku fakamaau; Ko ho ongo fo‘i fofonga na ‘oku na vakai ‘a e totonu.
Kuo ke ‘eke hoku loto; Kuo ke ‘a‘ahi mai ‘i he pō; Kuo ke sivi mai kae ‘ikai ‘ilo ha efe ‘iate au. Kuo ai koā ha‘aku fakakaukau kovi? ‘E ‘ikai ‘alu atu ‘i hoku ngutu.
Ka lau ki he tau‘aki tangata, Ko e me‘a ‘i he ngaahi lea ‘a ho fofonga Ko au Kuo u faka‘ehi‘ehi Mei he ‘alunga ‘o e fakamālohi.
Ko e ta‘ofi tu‘u ‘eku laka ki ho topuva‘e, Ko e me‘a ia kuo ‘ikai humu ai ‘eku hā‘ele.
Ko au Kuo u tautapa atu ki he ‘Afiona; He ‘oku ke tali au, ‘e ‘Otua: Ke ke ofe‘i ho fofonga kiate au, ‘O tokanga ki he‘eku lau.
Fai ‘a e ngaahi ‘ofa ‘ilonga, ‘A koe ‘oku ke malu‘i ‘a e kau hūfanga Mei he kau mākeke hake ki ho nima to‘omata‘u na.
Ke ke tauhi au ‘o hangē ha tama‘imata Fufū au ‘i he malu ‘o ho kapakau na.
Koe‘uhi ko e kau kovi ‘oku laiki au, ‘A hoku ngaahi fili fīta‘a ‘oku ‘ākolo‘i au.
Ko honau ngako ‘oku nau ‘opo ai; Ko honau ngutu ‘oku lea fielahi.
‘Oku mau laka ki hē; kuo ‘osi ‘enau kāpui mai: ‘Oku fakamama‘u ‘enau sio ke tulaki.
Hangē tofu pē ha laione ‘oku holi ke haea, Pe ha laione mui ‘oku tokotoaki ‘i he toitoi‘anga.
Tu‘u hake mu‘a, ‘e Sihova, Fakafetaulaki kiate ia: Tulaki pē ‘ena Fakahaofi ‘eku mo‘ui mei he kakai kovi ‘aki ho‘o heletā.

‘Io, mei he kau siana na ‘aki ho nima, ‘Eiki, Mei he kau siana fakaetaimi ‘Oku nau tofi‘a ‘aki ‘a e mo‘ui ni, Pea ‘oku ke fakafonu honau mānava ‘aki ho‘o tokonaki, ‘Oku nau topono (tokua) ‘i he ma‘u fānau tangata, Pea ‘oku nau tuku ki he‘enau tamaiki ‘enau toenga koloa.
Ka ko au–ka u mamata mu‘a ki ho fofonga ‘i he mā‘oni‘oni: Ka u topono mu‘a ‘i ha‘aku ‘ā hake ‘i ho‘o ha totonu mai.
